metadata.title: Premium Portfolio Landing + Admin Dashboard Style
metadata.description: JSON design brief describing the premium, dark-mode aesthetic showcased in the supplied reference for use across a multi-app portfolio landing page plus productivity dashboard.
metadata.inspirationSummary: Deep navy surfaces, floating cards with soft gradients, vibrant progress rings, and friendly stylized portraits anchored by crisp geometric typography.
metadata.intendedUse: Seed AI-generated concepts and enforce consistency across hero landing modules, project gallery, mock phone previews, and admin analytics dashboard.

brandPersonality.voiceGuidance: Headlines celebrate progress and achievement. Microcopy is concise, upbeat, and confident without sounding boastful.

backgrounds.name: Abyss Layer
backgrounds.usage: Card containers, footer panels, phone mock frame.

surfaceAccents.name: Frosted Indigo
surfaceAccents.usage: Hover states, floating widget layers with 70% opacity blur.

highlights.name: Aurora Teal
highlights.usage: Primary CTAs, progress arcs, focus states.

highlights.name: Signal Turquoise
highlights.usage: Positive deltas, pill labels, subtle glow edges.

highlights.name: Citrine Pop
highlights.usage: Profile tags, badge fills, accent buttons.

gradientPatterns.name: Orbit Pulse
gradientPatterns.usage: Radial progress rings, CTA hover glow.

typography.numeralStyle: Tabular figures enabled for KPI readability.
typography.microcopyTreatment: All-caps pill labels with 80% opacity text, 2px letter-spacing.

heroPanel.structure: Two-column layout with hero copy and CTA stacked left, mock phone browser floating right with layered cards behind.
heroPanel.background: Midnight Core gradient with faint diagonal noise.
heroPanel.ctaStyle: Full-width pill, Aurora Teal gradient, 8px inner glow, soft outer shadow rgba(64,200,244,0.35).

content: link chips for PRD + live demo

states.default: Deep Slate surface, thin 1px inner border #203368.
states.hover: Lift 4px, apply Frosted Indigo overlay, glow using Aurora Teal.

mockPhoneViewer.frame: Tall rounded rectangle, 3px border #14294F, notch indicator.
mockPhoneViewer.interaction: Swipeable carousel of screen images, each screen tinted to match project accent color.
mockPhoneViewer.reflection: Subtle bottom fade to simulate glossy glass.

navTabs.style: Segmented control with pill indicator. Labels in Inter 500, 14px.
navTabs.indicator: Gradient fill from Aurora Teal to Signal Turquoise, drop shadow 0 6 16 rgba(0,0,0,0.35).

dashboardMetricCard.visual: Semi-circle progress ring or segmented bar using gradient thresholds.

radialProgressWidget.animation: Clockwise sweep with elastic ease on load.

dataTiles.format: Stacked cards with icon chip, bold stat, mini spark bars.

ctaButton.shape: Full pill, 24px height minimum, 20px horizontal padding.
ctaButton.iconography: Rounded arrow icon, line weight 2px, white.

imagery.characterStyle: Stylized premium portraits with exaggerated facial features and warm lighting. Use subtle rim light to pop from navy background.
imagery.appMockups: Isometric or straight-on device renders with matching accent gradients. Apply soft depth-of-field to background layers.
imagery.badges: Rounded capsules with embossed edges and inner gradient glow.

layout.cardAlignment: Staggered layering with occasional overlap to suggest depth.

microInteractions: Cards float upward 4px with 200ms ease-out on hover.
Progress rings animate sweep + glow when values update.
Mock phone auto-scrolls through screens unless user hovers to pause.

feedback.success: Apply Signal Turquoise glow and tick icon.
feedback.warning: Use Citrine Pop background at 30% opacity, text stays white.

motion.parallax: Background constellations drift at 10% scroll speed; foreground cards move at 40%.

dataVisualization.style: Rounded bars, segmented arcs, dot matrices with glow tips.

accessibility.contrast: Maintain WCAG 2.1 AA for all text > 14px. Use lighter text tokens (#EDF1FF) on navy surfaces.
accessibility.focusStates: 2px outer ring using Aurora Teal plus 1px inner ring #FFFFFF at 60% opacity.
accessibility.motionSensitivity: Respect reduced-motion by disabling parallax and using opacity fades.

do: Layer cards with consistent depth and soft glows.
Keep typography weights bold for stats and medium for labels.
Pair vivid accents against rich navy to emphasize key actions.
Use stylized illustrated portraits or premium renders to humanize each app.
dont: Introduce flat white backgrounds or harsh black.
Use thin serif fonts or handwritten styles.
Overcrowd metricsâ€”limit to three KPIs per row.
Apply sharp drop shadows; always soften with 35px+ blur.
